name: places/ChIJWY19vb5ZwokRyZZqn_GA83o

authorAttributions.displayName: 郡司昇 店舗のICT活用研究所

adrFormatAddress: 141 8th Ave, New York, NY 10011, USA

originalText.text: Purchased a new phone here and the salesman included a warranty without asking whether I actually wanted one; be sure to ask for a breakdown of your bill!

text.text: Purchased a new phone here and the salesman included a warranty without asking whether I actually wanted one; be sure to ask for a breakdown of your bill!

originalText.text: Called Verizon customer service and they nearly ruined my trip to Europe. Shut off my phone, couldn’t call or text. I went here and met Bernard who fixed my phone in 5 mins. Don’t call customer service! See Bernard and he will set you straight! On my way to the airport now ;)

text.text: Called Verizon customer service and they nearly ruined my trip to Europe. Shut off my phone, couldn’t call or text. I went here and met Bernard who fixed my phone in 5 mins. Don’t call customer service! See Bernard and he will set you straight! On my way to the airport now ;)

originalText.text: What I needed to get done. This store didn't provide it, BUT the customer service from the guy in the store was GREAT! He gave me the address to the store that could help me. He was also able to answer all of my other questions.

text.text: What I needed to get done. This store didn't provide it, BUT the customer service from the guy in the store was GREAT! He gave me the address to the store that could help me. He was also able to answer all of my other questions.

originalText.text: This is a really great store.  The person I worked with, Duane, is amazing.  He is friendly, super knowledgeable, super helpful.  He was transparent about the available options, and answered my questions without a hard sell of any kind.  Everything was explained in detail.  He got me the best pricing he could and made himself available once I received my products to answer more questions.  I highly recommend Wireless One in Chelsea.  And I highly recommend Duane!

text.text: This is a really great store.  The person I worked with, Duane, is amazing.  He is friendly, super knowledgeable, super helpful.  He was transparent about the available options, and answered my questions without a hard sell of any kind.  Everything was explained in detail.  He got me the best pricing he could and made himself available once I received my products to answer more questions.  I highly recommend Wireless One in Chelsea.  And I highly recommend Duane!

originalText.text:
Today I went to two different Verizon wireless stores, 3 times total. I had a phone I needed transferred, no time, and a lot of frustration with dealing with different people in the last week. I went into the store and two nice men were working. I asked if they would help me set up the new phone I brought in, and they guided me on how to finish the set up since I had to leave and was short on time. When I got back to work and tried to do it myself, it all went down hill. The update froze, I couldn’t do what I needed to do for work which involved my phone so I called back and they helped, but suggested once work was over to come back to make sure it was all good to go. I returned at 5:30pm, the manager David was there and helped me literally until after the store closed. He had a family and home to go to in the pouring rain, but was so committed to making sure that as a customer I was satisfied and happy with my update that he stayed until almost 9pm assisting and reassuring me. I ended up returning the replacement phone and actually buying a brand new iPhone XS Max. I couldn’t be happier. He even sat on the phone with the other representative from Verizon corporate while we were figuring out totals for everything since the statement came out way higher than anticipated, and he got it back down to what it should be and even waived some fees.

I am so grateful for David’s help, kindness, and patience today. I was such a flustered mess that had no idea how to fix my phone and make it work, and with his help, (he didn’t once pressure me for buying ever, rather pointed out facts and broke down all of the content I needed to know) not forcing or lying to me at all about hidden fees. I would recommend David to anyone in need of help from Verizon. I will be going back for all of my inquiries.
